comments.body: Once the feedstock is create you can update this with the license version: `LGPL 3.0` according to the text.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +31,35 @@about:
  home: https://github.com/makinacorpus/django-leaflet
  license: LGPL
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file: LICENSE

comments.body:
We can drop the `fn` line for python recipes. I'll modify the example.
(It does sound silly to specify something that is already in the URL.)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +8,12 @@
source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}
